label: natureIdentificationCargo
comment: Transport cargo details of this referenced supply chain consignment item sufficient to identify its nature for customs, statistical or transport purposes.

rangeIncludes.comment: Information about goods being transported identifying their nature for customs, statistical or transport purposes.

domainIncludes.comment: A reference to an item within a supply chain consignment of goods separately identified for transport and customs purposes.,An item within a supply chain consignment of goods separately identified for transport and customs purposes.
